= How to compile and install =

== Settings ==

Environment parameter 'KVS_DIR' should be set before KVS is compiled and installed.

=== Linux/Mac OS X/Cygwin ===

 export KVS_DIR=/usr/local/kvs

 export PATH=$KVS_DIR/bin:$PATH

=== Windows (Microsoft Visual C/C++) ===

"KVS_DIR" : "C:\Program Files\kvs"

"PATH" : "%PATH%;%KVS_DIR%\bin"

== Compile and Install ==

=== Linux/Mac OS X/Cygwin ===

 % cd kvs

 % make

 % make install

=== Windows ===

 > cd kvs

 > nmake

 > nmake install

== Uninstall ==

=== Linux/Mac OS X/Cygwin ===

 % cd kvs

 % make uninstall

=== Windows ===

 > cd kvs

 > nmake uninstall
